patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,10 @@
+package com.homework.calc;
+
+public enum Actions {
+    NONE,
+    INC,
+    DEC,
+    DIV,
+    MULTI,
+    PERCENT
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,189 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context=".MainActivity">
+
+    <GridLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
+        android:background="@drawable/waterflow"
+        android:columnCount="2"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteX="-41dp"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="4dp">
+
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/etUserInput"
+            android:layout_width="395dp"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_row="0"
+            android:layout_column="0"
+            android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+            android:autofillHints="0"
+            android:enabled="false"
+            android:gravity="end|bottom"
+            android:inputType="textMultiLine"
+            android:lines="7"
+            android:text="0"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/horResultFontSize" />
+
+        <GridLayout
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_column="1"
+            android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
+            android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+            android:columnCount="4">
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnClear"
+                android:layout_marginRight="12dp"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="clear"
+                android:text="@string/keyClear"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnBackSpace"
+                android:layout_marginRight="12dp"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:drawableLeft="@drawable/m_backspace"
+                android:tag="back"
+                android:text="@string/keyBackSpace"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnPercent"
+                android:layout_marginRight="12dp"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="perc"
+                android:text="@string/keyPercent"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnDiv"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="div"
+                android:text="@string/keyDiv"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumSeven"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keySeven"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumEight"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyEight"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumNine"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyNine"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnMulti"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="multi"
+                android:text="@string/keyMulti"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumFour"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyFour"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumFive"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyFive"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumSix"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keySix"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnDec"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="dec"
+                android:text="@string/keyDec"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumOne"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyOne"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumTwo"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyTwo"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumThree"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyThree"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumInc"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="inc"
+                android:text="@string/keyInc"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumCopy"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:drawableLeft="@drawable/m_copy"
+                android:tag="copy"
+                android:text="@string/keyCopy"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnNumZerro"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyZero"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnLim"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="lim"
+                android:text="@string/keyLim"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/btnEq"
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:tag="eq"
+                android:text="@string/keyEq"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/horFontSize" />
+        </GridLayout>
+
+    </GridLayout>
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

     <LinearLayout
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
-        android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
-        android:gravity="center_horizontal"
         android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
         android:background="@drawable/waterflow"
-        android:layout_marginTop="10dp"

         android:orientation="vertical">
 
         <EditText
-            android:id="@+id/tvResult"

             android:layout_width="match_parent"

             android:gravity="end|bottom"

-            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

         <GridLayout
             android:layout_width="wrap_content"
             android:layout_height="match_parent"
             android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
-
             android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
             android:columnCount="4">
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnClear"
                 android:layout_marginRight="12dp"
-                android:text="C"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:tag="clear"
+                android:text="@string/keyClear"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/vertFontSize" />
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnBackSpace"
                 android:layout_marginRight="12dp"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
                 android:drawableLeft="@drawable/backspace"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:tag="back"
+                android:text="@string/keyBackSpace"

             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnPercent"
-                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
                 android:layout_marginRight="12dp"
-                android:text="%"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
+                android:text="@string/keyPercent"
+                android:tag="perc"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/vertFontSize" />
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnDiv"
-                android:text="÷"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:tag="div"
+                android:text="@string/keyDiv"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/vertFontSize" />
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnNumSeven"
-                android:text="7"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keySeven"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/vertFontSize" />
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnNumEight"
-                android:text="8"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyEight"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/vertFontSize" />
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnNumNine"
-                android:text="9"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyNine"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/vertFontSize" />
 
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnMulti"
-                android:text="×"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:tag="multi"
+                android:text="@string/keyMulti"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/vertFontSize" />
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnNumFour"
-                android:text="4"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyFour"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/vertFontSize" />
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnNumFive"
-                android:text="5"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />
+                android:tag="num"
+                android:text="@string/keyFive"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/vertFontSize" />
 
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnNumSix"
-                android:text="6"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"
-                android:textSize="42sp" />

             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnDec"
-                android:text="-"
                 android:backgroundTint="@color/buttonBackground"

             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnNumOne"

             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/btnNumTwo"

     </LinearLayout>

+    <dimen name="horFontSize">28dp</dimen>
+    <dimen name="vertFontSize">42dp</dimen>

@@ -1,3 +1,23 @@
 <resources>

+    <string name="keyTwo">2</string>

+    <string name="keyDiv">÷</string>
+    <string name="keyMulti">×</string>
